root.name: Sword of the Stars: Argos Naval Yard
root.description: Detailed info expansion19 new technologiesOver 75 new ship section to build10 new weapons / 3 New ScenariosSingle Player / Multi-player with co-op scenario mapsPC System RequirementsOperating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1.5 Ghz Intel® Pentium® or equivalentMemory: 1 GB RAM (2 GB for Vista)Hard Disk Space: 3 GB AvailableVideo Card: DirectX® 9 compliant video card with 128MB RAMSound Card: DirectX® 8.1 or better compatibleDirectX® Version: DirectX® 9cInternet Connection: at least 56k modemMultiplayer Requirement: Gamespy key (provided by publisher)
